tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    affected_systems INT,
    data_breached BOOL,
    attacker_id INT,
    response_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(100),
    affected_system VARCHAR(100),
    breach_method VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_incident_id FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES cybersecurity_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE victims (
    victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name VARCHAR(100),
    victim_organization VARCHAR(100),
    victim_ip_address VARCHAR(20),
    incident_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE attackers (
    attacker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attacker_name VARCHAR(100),
    attacker_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_description TEXT,
    affected_entities VARCHAR(100),
    breach_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE entities (
    entity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    entity_type VARCHAR(50),
    entity_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE hackers (
    hacker_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_name VARCHAR(50),
    hacker_country VARCHAR(50),
    hacking_method VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE security_measures (
    measure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name VARCHAR(50),
    measure_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investigation_date DATE,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    investigation_notes TEXT
)
